Translations.Text: tebarake-llezi in sae ce`ale leke hayram min zalike cennatin tecri min tahtihe-l'enharu veyec`al leke kusura
bel kezzebu bissa`ati vea`tedna limen kezzebe bissa`ati se`ira
iza raethum mim mekanim be`idin semi`u leha tegayyuzav vezefira
veiza ulku minha mekanen dayyikam mukarranine de`av hunalike subura
la ted`u-lyevme suburav vahidev ved`u suburan kesira
kul ezalike hayrun em cennetu-lhuldi-lleti vu`ide-lmuttekun. kanet lehum cezaev vemesira
lehum fiha ma yesaune halidin. kane `ala rabbike va`dem mes'ula
veyevme yahsuruhum vema ya`budune min duni-llahi feyekulu eentum adleltum `ibadi haulai em hum dallu-ssebil
kalu subhaneke ma kane yembegi lena en nettehize min dunike min evliyae velakim metta`tehum veabaehum hatta nesu-zzikr. vekanu kavmem bura
fekad kezzebukum bima tekulune fema testeti`une sarfev vela nasra. vemey yazlim minkum nuzikhu `azaben kebira
vema erselna kableke mine-lmurseline illa innehum leye'kulune-tta`ame veyemsune fi-l'esvak. vece`alna ba`dakum liba`din fitneh. etasbirun. vekane rabbuke besira
